creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
description: 145 cut-out color photographs figures--some with umbrellas, or black or red flags--seen from back or side; vertical cardboard element attached to back of each figure, in paper doll fashion; installed in a group on included pedestal with vitrine
dimension:
59 1/2 × 35 × 23 in. (151.13 × 88.9 × 58.42 cm) (overall, case with vitrine)
5 × 3 in. (12.7 × 7.62 cm) (object part, each figure, approx.)
markings: on back of some figures, stamped in black or red: FUNERAL OF THE ANARCHIST | on back of some figures, stamped in black: PAOLO VENTURA
medium: 145 hand-cut and painted archival pigment prints
signed: on back of #1 and #23, in pencil: P. Ventura | on back of #129, in black: SETT. 2014
title: Funeral of the Anarchist
